body_html:
It turns out that \left and \right weren't the problem after all. They work fine. The difficulty seems to be translating all the \text{...} for whatever reason. I removed the \text{} references:

.. math::
    D_{out} =
    \left\lfloor
      \frac{D_{in} + 2 * padding[0] - dilation[0] *
        (kernel\_size[0] - 1) - 1 }
        {stride[0]}
      + 1
    \right\rfloor

and now everything looks good to my eye.

I'm going through the rest of the equations now.

body: It turns out that \left and \right weren't the problem after all. They work fine. The difficulty seems to be translating all the \text{...} for whatever reason. I removed the \text{} references: ``` .. math:: D_{out} = \left\lfloor \frac{D_{in} + 2 * padding[0] - dilation[0] * (kernel\_size[0] - 1) - 1 } {stride[0]} + 1 \right\rfloor ``` and now everything looks good to my eye. I'm going through the rest of the equations now.
